BlackNightmare:

BlackNightmare stopped, was she imagine it orshe heard a noyse?? it 
was her imagination. She sighed and she almost arrive at her room.



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Injustice:
>  
> The clone was about to go to the lab o sleep, when he saw 
Blacknightmare.  Alone.  He grinned, he wanted a chance like this.  
He crept along the hall hoping to get to her before she went in her 
room.
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> BlackNightmare:
> 
> BlackNightmare walked slowly towards her room, she was worried 
about 
> Injustice, what was he doing? would he become dangerous for all? 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Hellplague/ Malice:
> >  
> > Hellplague watched with a smile as Blacknightmare left.  She sat 
> and let Malice sleep a little longer as she finished her energon.  
> She finished it, set the empty glass down, then shook the male's 
> shoulder.  He awoke and yawned as he set up.
> > "Its time for a nap, Malice go get some sleep," she said, 
smiling.
> > Malice got up and stumbled, Hellplague caught his arm and 
steadied 
> him.  She laughed and he grumbled.  She kept a hold of his arm and 
> walked him to his room.  She opened the doors and he stumbled in, 
> flopping on his bed.  He was asleep a moment later, and Hellplague 
> lef for her room, chuckling to herself.
> 
>
